mapper.select: SELECT id, po_code as poCode, supplier_id as supplierId, status, total_amount as totalAmount, expected_delivery_date as expectedDeliveryDate, remark, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, created_by as createdBy FROM purchase_order WHERE po_code = #{poCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase_order (po_code, supplier_id, status, expected_delivery_date, remark) VALUES (#{poCode}, #{supplierId}, #{status}, #{expectedDeliveryDate}, #{remark})
